SEARCH
Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface UserDaoInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserDaoOperations
public interface UserDaoInterface
Interface for User Data Access Object (DAO) operations. Defines methods for user-related database operations, such as registration and login.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    login(int userId, String password)
    Authenticates a user and logs them into the system.
    void
    signup(int userId, String password, String role)
    Registers a new user in the system.

  • Method Details

    • signup

      void signup(int userId, String password, String role) throws RoleNotFoundException, UserIdAlreadyInUseException
      Registers a new user in the system.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier for the user.
      password - The password for the user account.
      role - The role of the user (e.g., student, professor, admin).
      Throws:
      RoleNotFoundException - If the provided role is not recognized or valid.
      UserIdAlreadyInUseException - If the user ID is already taken by another user.

    • login

      void login(int userId, String password) throws UserNotFoundException, CourseNotAddedException, CourseNotFoundException, StudentNotApprovedException, StudentNotFoundException, ProfessorNotAddedException
      Authenticates a user and logs them into the system.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier for the user attempting to log in.
      password - The password provided by the user for authentication.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If no user is found with the given ID.
      CourseNotAddedException - If there is an issue related to course addition (e.g., course data errors).
      CourseNotFoundException - If the course involved in the login process cannot be found.
      StudentNotApprovedException - If the student is not approved by the admin yet.
      StudentNotFoundException - If the student record is not found.
      ProfessorNotAddedException - If the professor has not been added properly.
